an4.160:1.1: â€œSugato va, bhikkhave, loke titthamano sugatavinayo va tadassa bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an4.160:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava.
an4.160:3.2: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an4.160:3.4: Evam sugato va, bhikkhave, loke titthamano sugatavinayo va tadassa bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussananti.
an4.160:4.1: Cattarome, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti.
an4.160:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duggahitam suttantam pariyapunanti dunnikkhittehi padabyanjanehi.
an4.160:4.4: Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyanjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
an4.160:4.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dubbaca honti dovacassakaranehi dhammehi samannagata akkhama appadakkhinaggahino anusasanim.
an4.160:5.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhu bahussuta agatagama dhammadhara vinayadhara matikadhara, te na sakkaccam suttantam param vacenti.
an4.160:6.2: Tesam accayena chinnamulako suttanto hoti appatisarano.
an4.160:6.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, thera bhikkhu bahulika honti sathalika, okkamane pubbangama, paviveke nikkhittadhura, na viriyam arabhanti appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an4.160:7.3: Sapi hoti bahulika sathalika, okkamane pubbangama, paviveke nikkhittadhura, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an4.160:7.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:7.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattantiti.
an4.160:8.1: Cattarome, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattanti.
an4.160:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suggahitam suttantam pariyapunanti sunikkhittehi padabyanjanehi.
an4.160:8.4: Sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyanjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
an4.160:8.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvaca honti sovacassakaranehi dhammehi samannagata khama padakkhinaggahino anusasanim.
an4.160:9.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhu bahussuta agatagama dhammadhara vinayadhara matikadhara, te sakkaccam suttantam param vacenti.
an4.160:10.2: Tesam accayena nacchinnamulako suttanto hoti sappatisarano.
an4.160:10.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
an4.160:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, thera bhikkhu na bahulika honti na sathalika, okkamane nikkhittadhura, paviveke pubbangama, viriyam arabhanti appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an4.160:11.3: Sapi hoti na bahulika na sathalika, okkamane nikkhittadhura, paviveke pubbangama, viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an4.160:11.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattati.
